title: Account banned
body: Hi haven't been on since 2/5/2016 and just logged on today for a couple of games and my account is perm suspended this has never happened before and iv been playing for a number of years. can anyone explain to me please thanks

replies.body: I didn't get the email about a ban but I sent in a ticket about my ban... I got banned for using jungle timer that I used for nearly a year and since league put in jungle timers in the tab menu then I get ban... its no advantage I don't know why its so harsh been playing for over 7 years you think I would get a warning or something

Hey there,

Apologies for the delayed response.

Have you checked your email, you should've received an email when the ban was enacted with details about the ban.

If you're unable to find this email then you'll have to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support to find out why you were banned.
